animeTitle: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou: Prologue
otherNames: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou Episode 0, ありふれた職業で世界最強 プロローグ
synopsis: Initially screened at the Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou -Live & Act- event on January 19, 2020. It was later released via streaming platforms on March 19, 2020.
